trans-unit.source: Base class for entity types that are generated by the Entity Data Model tools.
trans-unit.target: Entity Data Model 工具所產生之實體類型的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key for this object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個物件的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityKey" /> for this object.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件的 <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityKey" />。

trans-unit.source: Object Services uses the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithKey.EntityKey%2A> property to manage objects in the object context.
trans-unit.target: 物件服務會使用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithKey.EntityKey%2A> 屬性，在物件內容中管理物件。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject.EntityKey%2A> property after an object is attached to an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>.
trans-unit.target: 您無法在物件附加到 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject.EntityKey%2A> 之後設定 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the entity state of the object.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件的實體狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityState" /> of this object.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件的 <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityState" />。

trans-unit.source: When an object is attached to the object context, either as the result of a query or by calling <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Attach%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.EntityState> becomes <xref:System.Data.EntityState.Unchanged>.
trans-unit.target: 當物件附加至物件內容時，不論是由於查詢或透過呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Attach%2A>，<xref:System.Data.EntityState> 都會成為 <xref:System.Data.EntityState.Unchanged>。

trans-unit.source: When an object is detached from the object context, it returns to the <xref:System.Data.EntityState.Detached> state.
trans-unit.target: 當物件與物件內容中斷連結時，它就會返回 <xref:System.Data.EntityState.Detached> 狀態。

trans-unit.source: The name of the changed property.
trans-unit.target: 已變更屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the change tracker that a property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 向變更追蹤程式通知屬性已經變更。

trans-unit.source: When an entity type is generated by the Entity Data Model tools, the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject.ReportPropertyChanged%2A> method is called after a property change to commit the cached value in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker> as the original value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 當 Entity Data Model 工具產生實體類型時，屬性變更之後就會呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject.ReportPropertyChanged%2A> 方法，將 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker> 中快取的值認可成該屬性的原始值。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker.EntityMemberChanged%2A> method in the change tracker.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在變更追蹤程式中呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker.EntityMemberChanged%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="property" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="property" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the changing property.
trans-unit.target: 變更中屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the change tracker that a property change is pending.
trans-unit.target: 向變更追蹤程式通知屬性變更已暫止。

trans-unit.source: When an entity type is generated by the Entity Data Model tools, the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject.ReportPropertyChanging%2A> method is called before a property change to cache the current value of the property in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker> so that this value can be used as the original value for the property.
trans-unit.target: 當 Entity Data Model 工具產生實體類型時，會在屬性變更之前呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject.ReportPropertyChanging%2A> 方法來快取 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker> 中該屬性的目前值，讓這個值可以用來當做該屬性的原始值。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker.EntityMemberChanging%2A> method in the change tracker.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在變更追蹤程式中呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker.EntityMemberChanging%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="property" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="property" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Reference to the change tracker that is used to report property changes.
trans-unit.target: 參考用來報告屬性變更的變更追蹤程式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker" /> that is used to report property changes.
trans-unit.target: 指定用來報告屬性變更的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by Object Services to specify the instance of <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker> for the object to use to track changes.
trans-unit.target: 物件服務會呼叫這個方法來指定讓物件用來追蹤變更的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is typically called when the entity is added to or removed from an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常會在 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> 中加入或移除實體時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets the relationship manager used by this object.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個物件所使用的關聯性 (Relationship) 管理員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager" /> used by this object.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件所使用的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject.System%23Data%23Objects%23DataClasses%23IEntityWithRelationships%23RelationshipManager%2A> returns a <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> used by this object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject.System%23Data%23Objects%23DataClasses%23IEntityWithRelationships%23RelationshipManager%2A> 會傳回這個物件所使用的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager>。

trans-unit.source: Object Services uses the relationship manager to provide access to related objects.
trans-unit.target: 物件服務會使用此關聯性管理員來提供相關物件的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Classes that expose relationships must implement this property by constructing and setting <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> in their constructor.
trans-unit.target: 公開 (Expose) 關聯性的類別必須透過在其建構函式 (Constructor) 中建構和設定 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager>，實作這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this property should use the static method <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.Create%2A> to create a new <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> when needed.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的實作 (Implementation) 應該會在需要時使用靜態 (Static) 方法 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.Create%2A> 來建立新的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager>。

trans-unit.source: After being created, it is expected that this object will be stored on the entity and will be provided through this property.
trans-unit.target: 建立之後，這個物件必須儲存在實體上，而且將透過這個屬性提供。
